Setting.Name: Loader::Agent::CommonJS###888-Framework
Setting.Description: List of JS files to always be loaded for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Customer::CommonJS###888-Framework
Setting.Description: List of JS files to always be loaded for the customer interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Agent::CommonCSS###888-Framework
Setting.Description: List of CSS files to always be loaded for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Customer::CommonCSS###888-Framework
Setting.Description: List of CSS files to always be loaded for the customer interface.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Module###AdminSystemFiles
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Frontend::NavigationModule###AdminSystemFiles
Setting.Description: Admin area navigation for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Module::AdminSystemFiles###001-Framework
Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Module::AdminSystemFiles###900-Framework
Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: PackageVerification
Setting.Description: Enables/disables the Znuny package verification. If disabled, all packages are shown as verified. It's still recommended to use only verified packages.

Setting.Name: DynamicFieldScreens###Framework
Setting.Description: Screens for which it is possible to enable or disable dynamic fields.

Setting.Name: DefaultColumnsScreens###Framework
Setting.Description: Screens for which it is possible to enable or disable default columns.

Setting.Name: GenericInterface::Invoker::Module###Ticket::Generic
Setting.Description: GenericInterface module registration for the invoker layer.

Setting.Name: GenericInterface::Invoker::Module###Generic::Tunnel
Setting.Description: GenericInterface module registration for the invoker layer.

Setting.Name: GenericInterface::Invoker::Ticket::Generic::PrepareRequest::Base64EncodedFields
Setting.Description: Mapping of Ticket::Generic invoker name (key) to list of fields (content) whose values will be base-64 encoded. Fields have to be given in the following form: Field1->Field2;Field3->Field4->Field5;Field6. So a nested data structure can be given by connecting the fields with '->'. Content of different fields can be given by separating those fields by ';'.

Setting.Name: GenericInterface::Invoker::Ticket::Generic::PrepareRequest::OmittedFields
Setting.Description: Mapping of Ticket::Generic invoker name (key) to list of fields (content) which will be removed from the request. Fields have to be given in the following form: Field1->Field2;Field3->Field4->Field5;Field6. So a nested data structure can be given by connecting the fields with '->'. Different fields can be omitted by separating them by ';'.

Setting.Name: GenericInterface::Invoker::Ticket::Generic::HandleResponse::MaximumParallelInstances
Setting.Description: Maximum number of parallel instances when using OTRS_AsynchronousInvokerExecution in invoker Ticket::Generic.

Setting.Name: LibXML::EnableHugeXMLDataSupport
Setting.Description: Enables support for huge XML data in load_xml calls of CPAN library XML::LibXML. This should only be enabled if absolutely needed. Disabling this option (default) protects against denial of service through entity expansion attacks. Before enabling this option ensure that alternative measures to protect the application against this type of attack have been taken.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###999-TicketToUnitTest
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to create a unit test for the current ticket.

Hash.Item: Creates a unit test file for this ticket.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###999-TicketToUnitTestSend
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to create and send a unit test for the current ticket.

Hash.Item: Creates a unit test file for this ticket and sends it to Znuny.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentTicketToUnitTest
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

Hash.Item: Creates a unit test file for a ticket.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Navigation###AgentTicketToUnitTest###002-Ticket
Setting.Description: Main menu item registration.

Setting.Name: DynamicFields::Driver###WebserviceDropdown
Setting.Description: Dynamic field backend registration.

Setting.Name: DynamicFields::Driver###WebserviceMultiselect
Setting.Description: Dynamic field backend registration.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Module###AJAXDynamicFieldWebservice
Setting.Description: Frontend module for the agent interface that provides the AJAX interface for the web service dynamic field backends.

Hash.Item: Web service dynamic field AJAX interface
AJAX interface for the web service dynamic field backends.

Setting.Name: CustomerFrontend::Module###AJAXDynamicFieldWebservice
Setting.Description: Frontend module for the customer interface that provides the AJAX interface for the web service dynamic field backends.

Hash.Item: Web service dynamic field AJAX interface
AJAX interface for the web service dynamic field backends.

Setting.Name: Ticket::EventModulePost###999-DynamicFieldWebservice
Setting.Description: Ticket event module that stores values of the selected web service record into the configured additional dynamic fields.

Setting.Name: GenericInterface::Invoker::Module###Test::DynamicFieldWebservice::TestGet
Setting.Description: GenericInterface module registration for the invoker layer.

Setting.Name: GenericInterface::Invoker::Module###Test::DynamicFieldWebservice::TestSearch
Setting.Description: GenericInterface module registration for the invoker layer.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Module###AdminDynamicFieldWebservice
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

Hash.Item: Admin configuration dialog for dynamic field types WebserviceDropdown and WebserviceMultiselect

Setting.Name: Loader::Module::AdminDynamicFieldWebservice###003-DynamicFieldWebservice
Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketZoom###HideWebserviceDynamicFieldsWithoutDisplayValue
Setting.Description: It might happen that a dynamic field of type WebserviceDropdown or WebserviceMultiselect will be set to a value fetched from a configured web service table but the web service record will not have a value set in the field that is configured as displayed value. Enable this setting to hide those dynamic fields in the ticket information widget of AgentTicketZoom so that they will not be shown as empty.

Setting.Name: DynamicFieldWebservice::FieldMapping
Setting.Description: Mapping for field values received from form. This setting is necessary for the correct identification of the form fields. Key means value type, value means possible representation in views.

Setting.Name: DynamicFieldWebservice::CustomFieldMapping
Setting.Description: Mapping for field values received from form which have multiple values. This setting is needed when the view shows the values of a particular field in a custom way (e.g. selectable customer user in ticket creation view). This setting is always respected first. There is also the possibility to specify an order for checking fields. (Field of customer user in ticket creation view can be saved as CustomerUser or just simple e-mail. First we need to check if CustomerKey is present (CustomerKey -> ID of CustomerUser). If not, then simply take plain text (CustomerTicketText -> E-mail)).

Setting.Name: DynamicFieldWebservice::AdditionalAttributes###Standard
Setting.Description: Options and default field set for attributes. Values of this setting will always be passed as simple form value without possibility to further configure it in AdminDynamicField view. The keys with which the form values will be sent to the invoker can be edited in the "Default" section of this setting.

Setting.Name: DynamicFieldWebservice::AdditionalAttributes###Selectable
Setting.Description: Options and default field set for selectable attributes. Values which will be passed to invoker (ID or Name or both) can be configured in AdminDynamicField view. The keys with which the form values (ID or Name) will be sent to the invoker can be edited in the "Default" section of this setting. Example usage for field Queue: Field with selected ID and Name will send QueueID = 3 and Queue = Raw.

Setting.Name: GenericInterface::Operation::Module###Ticket::TimeAccountingGet

Setting.Name: OutOfOffice::DisplayAgentOutOfOfficeMessage
Setting.Description: Template for the out-of-office message shown to the user in the frontend. Placeholders for out-of-office information can be used via ###PlaceholderName###. Possible placeholders are: StartYear, StartMonth, StartDay, EndYear, EndMonth, EndDay, DaysRemaining.

Setting.Name: OutOfOffice::DisplayAgentLoggedInMessage
Setting.Description: Message that will be shown if the agent is currently logged in.

Setting.Name: OutOfOffice::DisplayAgentLoggedOutMessage
Setting.Description: Message that will be shown if the agent is currently logged out.

Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the admin interface.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Navigation###AdminTicketAttributeRelations###003-TicketAttributeRelations
Setting.Description: Main menu item registration.

Setting.Name: Frontend::NavigationModule###AdminTicketAttributeRelations
Setting.Description: Admin area navigation for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Acl::Module###100-TicketAttributeRelations
Setting.Description: Adds ticket attribute relations based on CSV/Excel data.

Setting.Name: Core::TicketAttributeRelations::ACLActions
Setting.Description: Available/allowed actions for ticket attribute relations.

Setting.Name: Core::TicketAttributeRelations::AlwaysPossibleNone
Setting.Description: Always adds empty values to the ticket attribute relations so that it is not needed to add them to the CSV/Excel data.

Setting.Name: Ticket::EventModulePost###2000-TicketAllChildrenClosed
Setting.Description: Triggers event 'TicketAllChildrenClosed' if all child tickets of a parent ticket have been closed/merged/removed.

Setting.Name: Ticket::EventModulePost###999-NotifyOnEmptyProcessTickets
Setting.Description: Ticket event module which sends new ticket notifications even for tickets without articles.

Setting.Name: Process::DynamicFieldProcessManagementAttachment
Setting.Description: Name of the dynamic field in which the attachment file IDs of the transition will be stored.

Setting.Name: Process::DynamicFieldProcessManagementAttachment::Keep
Setting.Description: Keep dynamic field attachments after each transition.

Setting.Name: Process::DynamicFieldProcessManagementAttachment::FormatString
Setting.Description: Format string for output of attachments in the selection list. "%1$d": article number; "%2$s": filename; "%3$s": translated object type (e.g. Article => Artikel); "%4$s": translated attachment label (e.g. "Anhang").

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketBulk###Service
Setting.Description: Sets the service in the ticket bulk screen in the agent interface (Ticket::Service needs to be enabled).

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketBulk###DynamicField
Setting.Description: Dynamic fields shown in the ticket bulk screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketBulk###DynamicFieldRequireActivation
Setting.Description: This configuration defines if a dynamic field has to be checked in the agent ticket bulk view to get set for each ticket. This prevents unwanted overwrite of dynamic field values with their default or even empty values.

Setting.Name: DBCRUD###Export###DefaultFormat
Setting.Description: Default format for export files.

Setting.Name: DBCRUD###Export###CSV###Separator
Setting.Description: Separator for exported CSV files.

Setting.Name: DBCRUD###Export###CSV###Quote
Setting.Description: Quoting character for exported CSV files.

Setting.Name: DBCRUD::EventModulePost###9990-DBCRUD
Setting.Description: Handles changes to data of modules which use the DBCRUD base module.

Setting.Name: DBCRUD::OAuth2TokenConfig::CacheTTL
Setting.Description: Cache settings for DBCRUD modules (default: 1 day).

Setting.Description: Displays notifications for missing and expired OAuth2 tokens.

Setting.Name: SendmailModule::AuthenticationType
Setting.Description: Authentication type for sendmail module. If 'OAuth2 token' has been selected, SendmailModule::OAuth2TokenConfigName must also be configured.

Setting.Name: SendmailModule::OAuth2TokenConfigName
Setting.Description: Name of the OAuth2 token configuration to use for sending mails if 'OAuth2 token' was configured in SendmailModule::AuthenticationType.

Setting.Name: MailAccount::POP3::Auth::SplitOAuth2MethodAndToken::Hosts
Setting.Description: Hosts that need a separate info about authentication method and token (instead of both in one line). Most commonly needed for Office 365 and Outlook.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AccountTimeType
Setting.Description: Activates time accounting.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AccountTime::Dropdown###001-TimeUnits
Setting.Description: This option enables a dropdown which will be displayed instead of the time unit input field.

Setting.Description: This option enables a dropdown which will be displayed instead of the time unit input field.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AccountTime::Dropdown###003-TimeUnits
Setting.Description: This option enables a dropdown which will be displayed instead of the time unit input field.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentTicketOwnerView
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Navigation###AgentTicketOwnerView###002-Ticket
Setting.Description: Main menu item registration.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketOwnerView###SortBy::Default
Setting.Description: Defines the default ticket attribute for ticket sorting in the owner view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketOwnerView###Order::Default
Setting.Description: Defines the default ticket order in the owner view of the agent interface. Up: oldest on top. Down: latest on top.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketOwnerView###DefaultColumns
Setting.Description: Columns that can be filtered in the owner view of the agent interface. Note: Only Ticket attributes and Dynamic Fields (DynamicField_NameX) are allowed.

Setting.Name: Frontend::ToolBarModule###191-Ticket::TicketOwner
Setting.Description: Agent interface notification module to see the number of tickets an agent is owner for. Additional access control to show or not show this link can be done by using Key "Group" and Content like "rw:group1;move_into:group2".

Setting.Name: AppointmentCalendar::Plugin###TicketCreate
Setting.Description: Defines the ticket plugin for calendar appointments.

Setting.Name: Loader::Module::AgentAppointmentCalendarOverview###500-AppointmentCalendar::Plugin::TicketCreate
Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: AppointmentCalendar::Plugin::TicketCreate###StateType
Setting.Description: Defines the next possible ticket states for calendar based tickets.

Setting.Name: AppointmentCalendar::Plugin::TicketCreate###StateDefault
Setting.Description: Defines the default next state.

Setting.Name: AppointmentCalendar::Plugin::TicketCreate###PriorityDefault
Setting.Description: Defines the default ticket priority for calendar based tickets.

Setting.Name: AppointmentCalendar::Plugin::TicketCreate###ProcessTreeView
Setting.Description: Defines if the processes should be displayed in TreeView.

Setting.Name: AppointmentCalendar::Plugin::TicketCreate###Group
Setting.Description: Enables calendar based ticket creation feature only for the listed groups.

Setting.Name: AppointmentCalendar::Plugin::TicketCreate###Title
Setting.Description: Defines the default ticket title for calendar based tickets.

Setting.Name: AppointmentCalendar::Plugin::TicketCreate###Body
Setting.Description: Defines the default ticket body for calendar based tickets.

Setting.Name: AppointmentCalendar::Plugin::TicketCreate###ArticleChannelName
Setting.Description: Defines the default article channel name for calendar based tickets.

Setting.Name: AppointmentCalendar::Plugin::TicketCreate###ArticleIsVisibleForCustomer
Setting.Description: Defines the default visibility of articles for calendar based tickets.

Setting.Name: AppointmentCalendar::Plugin::TicketCreate###SenderType
Setting.Description: Defines the default sender type for calendar based tickets.

Setting.Name: AppointmentCalendar::Plugin::TicketCreate###From
Setting.Description: Defines the default from for calendar based tickets.

Setting.Name: AppointmentCalendar::Plugin::TicketCreate###HistoryType
Setting.Description: Defines the default history type for calendar based tickets.

Setting.Name: AppointmentCalendar::Plugin::TicketCreate###HistoryComment
Setting.Description: Defines the default history comment for calendar based tickets.

Setting.Name: AppointmentCalendar::Plugin::TicketCreate###ContentType
Setting.Description: Defines the default content type for calendar based tickets.

Setting.Name: AppointmentCalendar::Plugin::TicketCreate###TicketCreateCatchUpThreshold
Setting.Description: Threshold (in minutes) for catching up with ticket creation for appointments. Tickets for due appointments will only be created if their planned creation date is not older than the configured amount of minutes. This prevents creation of tickets for e. g. recurring appointments if the ticket creation will be executed some time later.

Setting.Name: Daemon::SchedulerCronTaskManager::Task###CalendarTicketCreate
Setting.Description: Creates the calendar-based tickets regularly.

Setting.Name: Daemon::SchedulerCronTaskManager::Task###CalendarTicketCreateCleanup
Setting.Description: Cleans up the calendar-based tickets regularly.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::ForwardQuoteMaxLines
Setting.Description: Maximum number of quoted lines to be added to forwarded messages.

Setting.Name: Daemon::SchedulerCronTaskManager::Task###ReindexSMIMECertificates
Setting.Description: Re-indexes S/MIME certificate folders. Note: S/MIME needs to be enabled in SysConfig.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketZoom::DisplayedAttachmentFilenameMaxLength
Setting.Description: Maximum length of displayed attachment filenames in the article preview of ticket zoom view.

Setting.Description: Defines which notifications about mentions should be sent.

Setting.Description: Defines if the toolbar mention icon should count mentions.

Setting.Description: Frontend registration of triggers for mention plugin of CKEditor.

Setting.Name: Mentions::RichTextEditor###Templates

Setting.Description: Agent interface notification module to show the number of mentions.

Setting.Description: Module to grant access to the mentioned agents of a ticket.

Setting.Name: Loader::Module::AgentTicketMentionView###002-Ticket

Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Activity###TypeIconMapping
Setting.Description: Assignment between type and icon.

Setting.Name: Activity###EventTypeMapping
Setting.Description: Assignment between event and type.

Setting.Name: PreferencesGroups###ActivityLinkTarget
Setting.Description: Defines the link type for each activity.

Hash.Item: Defines the link type for each activity.

Setting.Name: Notification::Transport###Activity
Setting.Description: Defines all the parameters for this notification transport.

Setting.Name: AppointmentNotification::Transport###Activity
Setting.Description: Defines all the parameters for this notification transport.

Setting.Name: ColorPicker###Palette
Setting.Description: List of colors in hexadecimal RGB which will be available for selection. Make sure the colors are dark enough so white text can be overlayed on them.

Setting.Name: AppointmentCalendar::NonStandardTimeZonesMapping
Setting.Description: Mapping of non-standard time zones to official ones.

Setting.Name: ICSParser::StartDate
Setting.Description: Start date (YYYYMMDD) of the range to use when parsing ICS files. The used CPAN module iCal::Parser needs this to be able to parse ICS files with events in a year before the current one. The end date of the range is automatically set to 10 years in the future from the time of parsing/execution.

Setting.Name: PreferencesGroups###MaxArticlesPerPage
Setting.Description: Defines the config parameters of this item, to be shown in the preferences view.

Hash.Item: Max. number of articles per page in TicketZoom
Select the maximum articles per page shown in TicketZoom. System default value will apply when entered empty value.

Setting.Name: DynamicFieldFromCustomerCompany::Mapping
Setting.Description: Define a mapping between variables of the customer company data (keys) and dynamic fields of a ticket (values). The purpose is to store customer company data in ticket dynamic fields. The dynamic fields must be present in the system and should be enabled for AgentTicketFreeText, so that they can be set/updated manually by the agent. They mustn't be enabled for AgentTicketPhone, AgentTicketEmail and AgentTicketCustomer. If they were, they would have precedence over the automatically set values. To use this mapping, you have to also activate the Ticket::EventModulePost###4100-DynamicFieldFromCustomerCompany setting.

Setting.Name: Ticket::EventModulePost###4100-DynamicFieldFromCustomerCompany
Setting.Description: This event module stores attributes from customer companies in ticket dynamic fields. Please see DynamicFieldFromCustomerCompany::Mapping setting for how to configure the mapping.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

Hash.Item: An additional screen to add notes to a linked ticket.

Setting.Name: Loader::Module::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###001-NoteToLinkedTicket
Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###Permission
Setting.Description: Required permissions to use the NoteToLinkedTicket screen in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###LinkedTicketState
Setting.Description: Sets the state of the selected linked ticket in the NoteToLinkedTicket screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###LinkedTicketStateDefault
Setting.Description: Defines the default next state of a ticket after adding a note in the NoteToLinkedTicket screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###NoteToTicket
Setting.Description: Activates the selection if a note in NoteToLinkedTicket screen should be created in this origin ticket.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###NoteToTicketDefault
Setting.Description: Defines the default value if a note in NoteToLinkedTicket screen should be created in this origin ticket.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###Subject
Setting.Description: Sets the default subject for notes added in the NoteToLinkedTicket screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###Body
Setting.Description: Sets the default body text for notes added in the NoteToLinkedTicket screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###Note
Setting.Description: Allows adding notes in the NoteToLinkedTicket screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###NoteMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if a note in NoteToLinkedTicket screen must be filled in by the agent.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###HistoryType
Setting.Description: Defines the history type for the NoteToLinkedTicket screen, which will be used for ticket history in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###HistoryComment
Setting.Description: Defines the history comment for the NoteToLinkedTicket screen, which will be used for ticket history in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###IsVisibleForCustomerDefault
Setting.Description: Defines if the note in the NoteToLinkedTicket screen of the agent interface is visible for the customer by default.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###TicketType
Setting.Description: Sets the ticket type in the NoteToLinkedTicket screen of the agent interface (Ticket::Type needs to be activated).

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###Service
Setting.Description: Sets the service in the NoteToLinkedTicket screen of the agent interface (Ticket::Service needs to be activated).

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###ServiceMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if service must be selected by the agent.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###SLAMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if SLA must be selected by the agent.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###Queue
Setting.Description: Sets the queue in the NoteToLinkedTicket screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###Owner
Setting.Description: Sets the ticket owner in the NoteToLinkedTicket screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###OwnerMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if ticket owner must be selected by the agent.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###Responsible
Setting.Description: Sets the responsible agent of the ticket in the NoteToLinkedTicket screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###State
Setting.Description: Sets the state of a ticket in the NoteToLinkedTicket screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###StateType
Setting.Description: Defines the next state of a ticket after adding a note in the NoteToLinkedTicket screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###StateDefault
Setting.Description: Defines the default next state of a ticket after adding a note in the NoteToLinkedTicket screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###Priority
Setting.Description: Shows the ticket priority options in the NoteToLinkedTicket screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###PriorityDefault
Setting.Description: Defines the default ticket priority in the NoteToLinkedTicket screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNoteToLinkedTicket###Title
Setting.Description: Shows the title field in the NoteToLinkedTicket screen of the agent interface.
